headline: Why This Medical Device Company Is the Top Stock in the S&P 500 Today
summary: DexCom  stock rose sharply Monday after the maker of glucose monitors reported better-than-expected preliminary results for the fourth quarter.  DexCom posted total revenue of around $1.26 billion for the quarter, up 13% from a year prior and above analysts’ consensus estimate of $1.24 billion.  The company also reiterated its guidance for 2025 adjusted gross profit margin of 61%.
